field.name: description
field.value: The generator name created by ActiveRecord for collection-id tags is incorrect for guid.comb, uuid.hex, and uuid.string. The included patch (#2) should apply cleanly in the Internal/Visitors folder of the trunk.

comment.author: mzywitza
comment.text: I get an error that the patch is outdated. Can you please update to trunk and recreate it?

comment.author: pat.earl
pat.earl
mzywitza
comment.text: * '''Resolution''' set to ''Applied''. * '''Version Fixed''' set to ''Future''. * '''Status''' changed from ''Work Started'' to ''Resolved''.
